name: McAddy's
address: 452 Broadway, Troy, NY 12180, United States

analyzed_reviews.review: Great prices and lots of seating!! They have a bar scene with tables if you want some noise, then they have a side room with more tables that is more quiet and then a whole upstairs room that’s even quieter. Such a nice place and lots of room. Good menu, on the smaller side but good selection and really good prices. The food came out so fast and it was really good. The waiters were amazing as well. Highly recommend.

name: Karavalli
address: 9 Johnson Rd, Latham, NY 12110, United States

analyzed_reviews.review:
Yes. The answer is yes, go here. You will not be disappointed whatsoever. The moment I walked through the door I knew I was going to really enjoy my time and the food. I honestly don't have much to say other than Karavalli is now my standard for Indian restaurants!

The flavors were strong and not overwhelming, you can tell all the food was fresh, and the portions were just right (I have leftovers and I'm so very excited about that!). The customer service was spot-on, absolutely no complaints just compliments!

For my first visit here I was left ready for my next of many visits so I can go through their extensive Vegan Menu, and then I'll go through their Vegetarian Menu, and then their Seafood Menu. I absolutely don't see my trips here stopping anytime soon! Oh, and they make a really good drink!

For not having much to say, Karavalli has me saying a lot! You're going to really enjoy your time here, so again, the answer is YES!

analyzed_reviews.review: Food was awesome. Very tasty burger. Didn't have the classic Sonic's atmosphere as dining room was quiet. I wanted to eat in my car in a stall to have the full experience but nobody had answered 5 minutes after pressing the red button.
